description:
Located in the heart of the lower east side, you're surrounded by many great restaurants, nightlife and entertainment venues. Our studio is less than 2 minute walk to the F,M,J,Z trains and only 8 minute walk to the B D express station. You can get anywhere you want in the city while saving a lot of time on commute. There are also citibike stations, which are conveniently located around almost every corner. Supermarket and Laundry is right next door.

There are multiple New York City Subway stations in the neighborhood, including Grand Street (B D), Bowery (J Z), Second Avenue (F), Delancey Street – Essex Street (F J M Z), and East Broadway (F). New York City Bus routes include M9, M14A, M14D, M15, M15 SBS, and B39.

If you have any questions or need anything, feel free to text or call my cellphone. Thank you
name: Comfy Home in Lower East Side Manhattan
review: Great little spot! Stayed for 5 nights, right in the LES hot spot with lots of bars and restaurants. Bed was very comfortable and the place was very clean! Would stay again
